channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:37 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 18:37 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 18:25 WARNING !!! DONE ASKRIGHT OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRIAL BOMB (Kabiv).
item.description: 🟢 18:25 WARNING !!! DONE ASKRIGHT OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRIAL BOMB (Kabiv). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
